entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023
